statements: UPDATE emergency_shelters SET capacity = 100, address = '123 Main St', city = 'New York' WHERE shelter_id = 1;
UPDATE emergency_shelters SET phone_number = '555-1234', state = 'CA', zip_code = '90210' WHERE shelter_name = 'Sunset Shelter';
UPDATE emergency_shelters SET phone_number = '123-456-7890', capacity = 100 WHERE shelter_id = 1;
UPDATE emergency_shelters SET address = '1234 Maple Street', city = 'Springfield', state = 'IL', zip_code = '62701' WHERE shelter_name = 'Springfield Rescue Center';
UPDATE emergency_shelters SET current_population = 50 WHERE shelter_id = 1;
UPDATE displaced_individuals SET gender = 'Male', age = 25 WHERE individual_id = 10;
UPDATE emergency_shelters SET location='Downtown', current_population=current_population+10 WHERE shelter_id=1;
UPDATE displaced_individuals SET age=age+1, gender='Female' WHERE individual_id=3;
UPDATE emergency_shelters SET capacity = 200 WHERE shelter_name = 'ABC Shelter';
UPDATE displaced_individuals SET gender = 'Female', name = 'Alice' WHERE individual_id = 123;
UPDATE emergency_shelters SET capacity = capacity + 50 WHERE shelter_id = 1
UPDATE displaced_individuals SET gender = 'Female', age = age + 1 WHERE individual_id = 3
UPDATE emergency_shelters SET status='Approved' WHERE shelter_id=1;
UPDATE shelter_occupation SET occupied_capacity=30, last_updated=NOW() WHERE shelter_id=2;
